thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 13 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Catena Media Enters French Market By Acquiring ParisSportifs.com

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Catena Media Enters French Market By Acquiring ParisSportifs.com
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - CATENA MEDIA PLC:
* CATENA MEDIA ENTERS THE FRENCH MARKET BY ACQUIRING TOP SPORTS BETTING SITE PARISSPORTIFS.COM
* ACQUIRED ASSETS CURRENTLY GENERATE QUARTERLY SALES OF ABOUT EUR 500.000
* INITIAL PURCHASE PRICE AMOUNTS TO AN UP-FRONT PAYMENT OF EUR 8.2 MILLION, OF WHICH EUR 6.2 MILLION WILL BE PAID IN CASH
* PRICE OF EUR 2.0 MILLION WILL BE IN NEWLY ISSUED SHARES IN CATENA MEDIA PLC
* SHARES WILL BE ISSUED AT A SUBSCRIPTION PRICE OF SEK 120,97 PER SHARE
* THERE IS AN EARN-OUT OF A MAXIMUM EUR 5.7 MILLION, BASED ON REVENUE PERFORMANCE OVER A PERIOD OF ONE YEAR. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
